sndlib.ext.generators.gml
Class SNDlibGmlGenerator

java.lang.Object
  sndlib.ext.generators.gml.SNDlibGmlGenerator

public class SNDlibGmlGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides a simple interface for generating GMLs for Problems and SolvedProblems.

Author:
Roman Klaehne
See Also:
SNDlibGmlProperties, ProblemGmlGenerator, SolutionGmlGenerator

Returns the default GML generator, initialized with the default properties as returned by SNDlibGmlProperties.getDefaults().

getInstance

public static SNDlibGmlGenerator getInstance(SNDlibGmlProperties gmlProps)
Returns a new GML generator, initialized with the specified properties.

Parameters:
gmlProps - the GML properties to be used when generating GML documents
Returns:
the default GML generator
